titleInfo.title: [Legal document] 1826 Aug. 23, Rhea County, Tennessee [Order for personal possessions of James Coulter to be sold and the money paid to Roberts & McCallie]

mods.abstract: This is a legal document dated August 23, 1826. The document orders any lawful officer to collect and sell the goods and chattel of a James Coulter, and to give the value of $12.00 from the sale of these goods to merchants Roberts & McCallie in payment of a debt. It also orders that 25 cents be paid for court costs accrued in the suit brought against James Coulter.
